thread.title: A Win for Empire Dreams
thread.title_full: A Win for Empire Dreams - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: A Win for Empire Dreams
text:
Empire Dreams beat Royal Posse by three-quarters of a length to win the $300,000 Empire Classic, the richest of the 11 races for New York-bred horses at Belmont Park. Empire Dreams, a 4-year-old gelding ridden by Manny Franco, rallied six wide in the stretch for his fifth win in 17 starts. He covered the mile and an eighth in 1 minute 48.35 seconds.
